titles.title: Law Enforcement Training for Mental Health Crisis Response Act of 2019
Law Enforcement Training for Mental Health Crisis Response Act of 2019
A bill to provide grants to State, local, territorial, and tribal law enforcement agencies to obtain behavioral health crisis response training for law enforcement officers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Law Enforcement Training for Mental Health Crisis Response Act of 2019
This bill directs the Office of Justice Programs within the Department of Justice to award grants to law enforcement agencies for behavioral health crisis response training.
